headline: FAO: Ata mafaranga abonetse indege zo kurwanya inzige zirahagarara
text: Ishami rya ONU rikurikirana uburimyi n'ivyo kurya kw'isi FAO riragabisha ko indege zaryo zose zafasha mu kurwanya inzige zongeye gutera muri Afrika y'ubuseruko zishobora kudasubira gukora hamwe ritoronka amafaranga angana na miriyoni 38 z'ama dolari ($38 million). Izo nzige zitema zigatongora imirima zongeye gutera muri Ethiopia, Kenya na Somalia aho zigeramiye imibereho y'abarimyi n'abarozi basanzwe bahanzwe n'ingaruka z'izikiza ca Covid-19 n'imyuzure muri ako karere. Ku mwihwezo wa vuba, FAO isanga izo nzige zimaze gutera mu ntara 11  muri Kenya kandi ko ziriko zitera zija mu ntara zo kw'ibahari z'ico gihugu hamwe no muri Tanzania. Zimaze kwonona kandi imirima muri Ethiopia na Somalia uyu mwaka. Ribaye irya  gatatu  muri aka karere hatera inzige mu kiringo c'umwaka umwe. Inzige zateye: Aho ziva, ibyo zangiza, uko zirwanywa...ibyo ukeneye kumenya Icyorezo cy'inzige cyageze muri Uganda na Tanzania FAO iragabisha ko hagiye kuba ikindi gitero c'inzige Izo nzige nshasha zafashijwe gushwara akarere n'igihuhusi Gati  catumye mu minsi mike hagwa imvura ingana n'iyoguye mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri. Vyatumye inzige zoroherwa mu kugwirirana. Umuhuzabikorwa w'ibikorwa vyihuta muri FAO muri Somalia, Ezana Kassa, avuga ati: "Ingaruka n'uko uburimyi n'ubworozi bihungabana cane mu gihugu kidasanganywe amaragamo mu vyerekeye ivyo kurya'' Iryo shami rya ONU rivuga ko gupompa imiti mu kirere no hasi , vyakozwe kuva izo nzige ziteye ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2020, vyari vyatumye hakizwa ibitegwa n'ibitungwa biciye amafaranga aharugwa muri miriyaridi 1.2 z'ama dolari. "Aho inzige zaheruka gutera ku rugero rusa n'uru rw'ubu, mu karere ka Sahel, vyasavye imyaka ibiri n'amafaranga arenga miriyoni 500 z'ama dolari kugira zishobore gutuzwa. Iki gitero kirakomeye gusumba, ariko ibihugu vy'a Afrika y'ubuseruko bisa n'ibizogitsinda-gusa ni bitange amafaranga y'igitoro kugira indege zigume zikora'',  bivugwa n'icegera c'umuyobozi mukuru wa FAO Laurent Thomas.

headline: Ubutunzi bwa Afghanistani buteye ahatemba
text: Ku musi wa kabiri, itariki 23 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), hari hakwiye imisi 100 kuva abatalibani bagarutse ku butegetsi muri Afghanistani. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC, Yalda Hakim yaragendeye akarere ka Kabul, kurondera inkuru yerekeye ubutunzi bwagabanutse kuva imfashanyo y’amakungu ihagaritswe, bituma haba akaga ku bantu.

headline: South Korea: Kompanyi y'amata yasavye imbazi kubera yerekanye abagore nk'inka
text: Kompanyi ya mbere nini y'amata muri Korea y'Epfo vyabaye ngombwa ko isaba imbabazi kubera video yo kwamamaza (publicité, advert) yerekana abagore nk'inka. Iyo video ya Seoul Milk yerekana umugabo ariko afata rwihishwa amashusho y'abagore bari mu murima, mu nyuma baca bahinduka inka. Imaze kunegurwa cane, iyo kompanyi yaciye ivana iyo publicité kuri YouTube, ariko kuva ico gihe imaze guhererekanywa cane inyuma yo gusubizwa  ku mbuga n'abakoresha internet. Bamwe bagereranije kandi inyifato y'uwo mugabo na "molka", ingeso itemewe yo gufata amashusho abantu rwihishwa. Ishami rya Seoul Milk, Seoul Dairy Cooperative ryavuze mu mbabazi ryashize kuri internet riti: "Turasavye imbabazi bivuye ku mutima ku muntu wese yababajwe n'iyo publicité y'amata yasohotse itariki 29 mu kwezi guheze". "Twemera ko iki kibazo gikomeye kandi tozokwisuzuma, hanyuma turushirizeho kwiyubara kugira ibintu nk'ibi ntibisubire gushika muri kazoza. Turicishije bugufi mu gusaba imbabazi". Iyo video itangura yerekana umugabo afise camera ariko yitembereza mu gahinga. Ijwi ry'umugabo ryumvikana rivuga ngo: "Amaherezo twashoboye kubafata amashusho na camera mu kibanza ciza cane". Aho haca hakurikira uwo mugabo yinyegeje mu bisaka, ariko afata amashusho rwihishwa umugwi w'abagore bariko baranywa amazi mu mugezi bongera bagira yoga. Hagera aho uwo mugabo ahonyora atabishaka kw'ishami ry'igiti, abo bagore bagaca bikanga buno nyene bagaca bahinduka inka. Iyo publicité irangizwa n'aya majambo: "Amazi meza, indya nziza, amata ya Seoul Milk ni  100%. Amata atagira akanenge, avuye mw'iraro ritagira akanenge mu murima uteye igomwe wa Cheongyang." Iyo publicité/advert yatumye haba impari zikomeye mu gihugu ku bijanye n'ivangura n'ibindi bibazo bishingiye ku bitsina ariko ibineguro ntivyagarukiye ku kwerekana abagore nk'inka gusa. Bamwe barerekanye amakenga yo kuba umugabo afata rwishishwa amashusho y'abagore, mu gihe ivyaha vyo gufata amashusho rwishishwa vyagwiriye cane muri Korea y'Epfo muri iyi myaka. Molka, bisigura "camera yinyegeje", ubu yabaye ikibazo kidasanzwe ku bagore muri Korea y'Epfo. Si ubwa mbere Seoul Milk ivugwa mu binyamakuru kubera imvo zitari nziza. Mu 2003, iyo kompanyi yatunganije agakino aho abanyamideri bari gusa basukanako ikivuguto   (yoghurt). Umukuru w'igisata co kwamamaza muri Seoul Milk hamwe n'abagize uruhara muri ako gakino baratangishijwe ihadabu kubera kwerekana ibiterasoni.

headline: Burundi: Rusansuma y’abashomeri, bamwe barizeye akazi abandi bati ‘nta gishasha’
text: Igikorwa catanguye ku wa gatandatu uheze co kwandika urwaruka rwahejeje amashure rudafise akazi kizobandanya kubera ubwinshi bwabo, ni mu gihe vyari vyitezwe ko kirangira kw'isaha zitandatu ejo ku wa mbere. Mu minsi itatu, leta y'u Burundi ivuga ko yashoboye kwandika abashika 245.000, ariko kandi ko gushika ejo ku wa mbere hari hakiri benshi bakirindiriye kwandikwa. Abandikwa bavuga ko babazwa vyinshi harimwo ibijanye n'amashure bize hamwe impamyabushobozi bafise, igihe bayizonkeye, n'ibindi. Ntaco babwirwa uretse ko ari rusansuma rw'abashomeri bariko barakora. Bamwe bavuga ko ibi nyene vyabaye no mu myaka myinshi bandikwa buri mwaka, bakabona ko ata gishasha, ariko ubu bamwe barizigiye ko leta ishobora kubafasha. Igihe arahiza abashikiranganji ba leta yiwe, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yatangaje ko yiyemeje gushigikira urwaruka "cane cane bamwe bafise impapuro z'umutsindo ariko batararonka ico bakora". Umwe mu bavuganye na BBC, hampande y'amashure n'impamyabushozobi, avuga ko yabajijwe ubwoko bw'akazi yipfuza canke umutahe abona yoshobora gukoresha mu gihe yoba afise umugambi wo kurangura. Mu gihe abiyandikisha ari abahejeje amashure bakirondera akazi nk'uko binavugwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, uyu mushomeri avuga ko ataco babwirwa kuri iki. Ati: "Nta wuzi ko bagomba kuduha akazi, canke imitahe, gushika ubu turarindiriye". Uwundi mukenyezi atipfuje kuvugwa amazina yavuganye na BBC, avuga ko ico babwiwe conyene ari uko hariko hakorwa rusansuma y'abashomeri. Ati: "Jewe sinibaza ko ari akazi bashaka kuduha, kuko ivy'akazi baheruka gukoresha ikibazo, abaronse bararonse. Ariko baratubwira ko bibaye ngombwa tuzoja hamwe hanyuma bakaduha imitahe tugakorera hamwe". Uyu afise icizere gito kuko ngo sibwo bwa mbere yandikwa kuva ahejeje amashure. Ati: "Nama mbona batwanditse bigaherera iyo, turamenyereye kwiyandikisha. "Kuva umwaka wa mbere mpejeje amashure mu 2014 nta mwaka urengana batatwanditse. Maze imyaka itandatu nguma nandikwa, ariko nta cahindutse". Hagati aho, aremeza ko iri yandikwa ry'ubu ritandukanye n'iryari risanzwe rihari afatiye kuvyo yabajijwe. Yongerako ati: "Mfise icizere ko nzohava nkaronka umutahe kuko muvyo bambajije barambajije umutahe noba nkeneye kugira nshobore kurangura umugambi wo kwiteza imbere". BBC yashatse kuronka insiguro kuri kino gikorwa kimaze iminsi ine co kwandika abahejeje amashure ariko batigeze baronka akazi, uruhande rwa leta ntaco rwashimye gutangaza bikiriko birakorwa. Hagati aho, mw'ijambo ryiwe arahiza leta nshasha Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko mu migambi yiwe itandatu yihutirwa harimwo kuzamura urwaruka, cane cane abahejeje amashure batararonka akazi. Bwana Ndayishimiye yagize ati:"Abo nibo cane cane nshaka ko bazoba intwazangabo zirongora abandi mu rugamba rwo kugwanya ubukene ku rwego rw'intango". "Aho bukera tugira dushware mu makomine yose agize Uburundi, tuje kwegeranya urwo rwaruka mu kibiri, batwereke imigambi bafise, bashaka gukora. "Aho tuzosanga batoye kworora tuzobafasha kworora, aho tuzosanga batoye uwundi mugambi, tuzowubafasha". Ikiriho ni uko biboneka ko abashomeri biyandikisha ari benshi cane mu gihugu, nk'uko vyemezwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere ku rubuga rwabwo rwa Twitter. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ku munsi wa mbere gusa batanguye ico gikorwa handitswe abashika 45.000. Mu gihe gushika ku mugoroba w'ejo ku wa mbere, abashika 245.000 ari bo bari bamaze kwandikwa mu gihugu cose, abandi barenga 35,000 bari baraye bategerejwe kwandikwa.

headline: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w’ Ubuyapani aragabisha Afrika ku madeni y’umurengera
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani aragabisha abategetsi ba Afrika ku ngaruka z'ugufata amadeni menshi, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'itororokaniriza ry'amakuru AFP. Ayo majambo ya Shinzo Abe afatwa nk'igabisha ku ruhara rw'Ubushinwa muri Afrika mu gihe buvugwa ko bushira imbere amakompanyi yabwo mu migambi ikomeye kuri uwo mugabane. Yabwiye abategetsi bari mu nama i Yokohama muri ico gihugu yerekeye iterambere rya Afrika ko Ubuyapani bwipfuza guteza imbere imitahe "ngirakamaro" yoshigikirwa n'amashirahamwe y'Ubuyapani. AFP ivuga ko ico gihugu gitegekanya kwigisha abahinga 30 bava mu bihugu vya Afrika  mu myaka itatu iri imbere ku buryo bwo guhangana n'ibiza n'amadeni ku gihugu. Avuga ko abakora imigambi y'iterambere boterwa intege kugira ngo bashobore guteza imbere ubutunzi ku mugabane wa Afrika. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani yasubiwemwo amajambo avuga ati: " Mu gihe ibihugu bigenzi vyugarijwe n'amadeni y'umurengera, bica biba inzitizi kuri uyo wese yari afise imigambi y'ukuzana imitahe yabo". Bwana Abe ari mu barongoye inama mpuzamakungu ya Tokyo kw'iterambere rya Afrika (Ticad), ikaba yateguwe mu gihe Ubushinwa buriko bushinga imizi muri Afrika. Ubuyapani buvuga ko intumbero bufise kuri Afrika ari ukuyifata mu mugongo mu buryo bw'amafaranga n'ikoreshwa ryayo, intumbero itandukanye n'iyo Ubushinwa.

headline: 'Umukuru wa Twitter Elon Musk 'ntari hejuru y’amategeko'' - Umugenzuzi wa US
text: Kimwe mu bigo vy’ubugenzuzi vya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kivuga ko kiriko kirakurikiranira hagufi ingene ibintu biriko biragenda muri Twitter "n’impungenge nyinshi". Ni inyuma y’aho hari abakozi bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bajejwe amabanga hamwe no kwubahiriza amategeko bavugwa ko batanze imihoho. Umurwi w’igihugu ujejwe ubucuruzi (Federal Trade Commission,FTC) uvuga ko umukuru w'urwo rubuga mushasha Elon Musk atari  "hejuru y’amategeko ". Mu yandi makuru, Musk avugwa ko yoba yarabwiye abakozi ko n’ivyo kwugara bishoboka. Iyi kompanyi iri mu mayira abiri kuva aho Musk atanguriye kwirukana ibihumbi n’ibihumbi vy’abakozi mu ndwi iheze. Ubushobozi bwo kugura 'status' ku bakoresha uru rubuga mu gihe ari uwiyandikishije gushasha bwongereje impungenge ko Twitter ishobora kwuzura ama konte y’ibinyoma. Ejo ku wa kane, Yoel Roth, yari arongoye igisata ca Twitter kijejwe umutekano yashize umwidondoro mushasha kuri runo rubuga hwaniro amenyesha ko atakiri muri ico kibanza. Amakuru avuga ko umukuru w’igisata kijejwe amakuru y’ibanga Damien Kieran be n’umukuru w’igisata kijejwe ivyo kwubahiriza amategeko Marianne Fogarty batanze imihoho. N’uwujejwe umutekano muri iyo kompanyi Lea Kissner na we nyene yaratanze imihoho. Kubona aba bantu baragiye bishobora kwongereza ivyago vya Twitter vyo guhonyanga amabwirizwa y’ubugenzuzi. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu, iyi kompanyi yaraciwe ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 150 kubera kugurisha amakuru y’abayikoresha, bikaba vyabaye ngombwa ko yemera ko hashingwa ayandi mabwirizwa mashasha ajanye no gucungera amakuru y’ibanga. Douglas Farrar, umukuru w’igisata kijejwe imigenderanire muri FTC, avuga ati: "Turiko turakurikirana ibiherutse kuba kuri Twitter n’impungenge nyinshi”. "Nta muyobozi canke ikompanyi iri hejuru y’amategeko, kandi amakompanyi ategerezwa gukurikiza ivyo twemeranije”. Farrer avuga ko FTC ifise “ibikoresho bishasha biyiha ubushobozi bwo kugenzura ko kompanyi iriko ikurikiza ivyo yiyemeje kandi turiteguye kubikoresha”. Twitter yarishe ihadabu mu kwezi kwa gatanu inyuma yo kwagirizwa ko yari yagurishije mu buryo buteye kubiri n’amategeko amakuru y’ibanga y’abayikoresha kugira biyifashe kugurisha amatanganzo yo kwamamaza. Iruhande y’iri hadabu, yategerejwe kwemera amabwirizwa mashasha, kandi ikemera gushiraho umugambi  ukomeye wo gucungera amabanga n’umutekano vy’abayikoresha – bigenzurwa n’aba bategetsi bavugwa ko batanze imihoho. Kuva afashe mu minwe Twitter, Musk yarirukanye uwahoze ari umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa Parag Agrawal hamwe n’abandi bategetsi bo hejuru, mbere n’abajejwe ibikorwa vyo kwamamaza n’amasoko na bo nyene baragiye. Ibi vyose biza kwongereza amakenga kuba Twitter idafise abantu bakwiye bashobora gucungera nimba ibandanya igendera ku mategeko ngenderwako. Vyongeye, amwe mu makompanyi makuru makuru yamamaza yaratewe ubwoba n'inzira Musk ariko atwaramwo iyi kompanyi y’urubuga hwaniro. Twitter yinjiza amafaranga yayo hafi yose biciye mu kwamamaza, ariko amakompanyi amwe amwe yabaye arabangira kurekura amahera yayo, mu gihe acihweza impinduka Musk ariko arazana. Amakompanyi amwe amwe avugwa ko afise amakenga ko Musk azodegura mu mategeko yo kugenzura ibica ku rubuga rwiwe mbere anahindure ingingo zo kwugara imbuga z’abantu bamwe bamwe bateje ibibazo, harimwo na Donald Trump yahoze arongoye Amerika. Bivugwa ko Musk yoba yarabwiye abakozi bari mu nama ko atabona neza kazoza k’ingene ubutunzi bwiyongera muri iyo kompanyi, kandi ko atawoshira kure guhomba burundu. Twitter yarasabwe kugira ico ishikirije. Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi The Verge ari na rwo rwasohoye ijambo ryose Musk yashikirije abakozi, ruvuga ko Twitter itagifise igisata c’ukumenyesha amakuru.

headline: Spice Diana ati 'Nsaba Imana ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza'
text: Igisata c'umuziki muri Uganda kiriko kiratera imbere, kandi kirimwo abacuraranzi batari bake b'abagore bamaze gutera imbere. Spice Diana afise indirimbo zitari nke amaze gusohora ubu akaba ariko aritegurira urukurikirane rwiwe rwa mbere. Aherutse kandi no gushirwa ku rutonde rw'abahiganira agashimwe kitiriwe MTV Africa Music Awards  (MAMA). "Iri genwa ryantumye mbona ko nkwiye gukora ntagoheka kubera vyanyeretse ko umuziki wanje ushimwa ku mbuga mpuzamakungu hamwe no muri Afrika". "Numva umengo bambwiye bati: 'Hey, Spicey. Usanzwe ukora ibikomeye, rero utegerezwa kwihata gusumba'." Spice Diana avuga ko ibihe bigoye Uganda yari imazemwo iminsi vyagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki, akipfuza ko ibintu vyosubira mu buryo kugira ngo ibikorwa vyabo bibandanya ukuri kwamye. Spice Diana yabwiye ikiganiro This Is Africa (Iyi Ni Afrika)  ko umurwi w'abana batamba wiyise Triplets Ghetto Kids ari wo watumye ashobora gushika aho ageze. Yarabakunda cane, bimutuma abona ko akwiye kuza arabandikira indirimbo, ariko bobo bamubonyemwo ubushobozi: Ati: "Muri jewe nibwira nti: 'Oya, kuririmba ntavyo nshoboye', ariko bobo muri bo bavuga bati 'Urashobora kuririmba!' Si niyemera, ariko abo bana baranteye intege nyinshi, ku buryo nabona ntobahemukira". Umwaka uheze ntiworoheye abanyamuziki muri Uganda. Mu bitandukanye n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi byo muri Afrika, Uganda yarafashe amategeko yo kubabuza ibikorwa vyabo. Igihe abanyamuziki ba Nijeriya, Omar Ley na Tems bakora igiteramo cabo, birengagije amategeko ya Covid-19, abanyamuziki benshi ba Uganda barashavuye cane. Spice Diana ati: "Twarashavuye cane, ariko mu nyuma twamenye ko ari umunya Uganda yari yateguye ico giteramo, maze twifatanya n'aba banyanijeriya kubera twabonye ko igiporisi cakoze nabi kubahagarika mu gihe atari bo bari bagiteguye". Spice Diana  avuga kandi ko imigumuko yagiye yibonekeza mu gihugu igihe cariko citegurira amatora yagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki ba Uganda. Ati: "Abantu benshi baratakaje ubuzima bwabo, abandi baratakaza ubuzi bwabo, hanyuma igihe cose ivyo bibaye, abakunzi bacu baba biteze ko hagira ico tuvuze". Ati: "Rimwe na rimwe, usanga ata vyinshi uzi muri poritike - ugaca usanga iyo ubuze ico ushikiriza, abantu baraguhevye mbere n'umuziki wawe bakawuheba". "Rero nsaba ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza inyuma y'ibi vyose".

headline: Bob Marley: Kwibuka imyaka 40 iheze iyo mboneza ipfuye
text: Imyaka 40 iraheze kuva umuririmvyi wa reggae yasize izina Bob Marley yishwe na cancer i Miami, ku myaka 36, hari ku wa 11 ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 1981. Uwo munyamuziki n'umwe mu bakundwa kandi bemewe cane muri kahise k'umuziki, ku ndirimbo nyinshi zabiciye bigacika nka No Woman No Cry, One Love, na Redemption Song. Indirimbo yiwe Buffalo Soldier niyo yabaye rurangiranwa kurusha izindi mu Bwongereza, aho yagiye mu kibanza ca kane mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 1983. Album [urukurikirane rw'indirimbo] yo mu 1977 Exodus yiswe Album y'Ikinjana n'ikinyamakuru Time Magazine. Marley yavutse mu 1945, kuri se w'umuzungu na nyina w'umwirabure, muri Jamaica. Nk'umwana yakuriye mu bukene kandi nta migenderanire myinshi bari bafitaniye na se, uwo akaba yari asanzwe ari umusirikare wo mu mazi yakorera reta y'Ubwongereza. Yavuye iwabo ku myaka 14 aja gutangura umwuga w'umuziki i Kingston. Mu  1972, Marley yashitse mu Bwongereza n'umugwi wiwe The Wailers kuremesha ibiteramo na Johnny Nash mu ntumbero yo kugerageza kumenyekana ku rubuga mpuzamakungu. Mu mwaka ukurikira, The Wailers basohoye album yabo Catch a Fire baca bakora igiteramo cabo ca mbere kuri television kuri BBC. Ico giteramo cagize ingaruka nini cane gica kibazanira abakunzi benshi ku bo bari basanganywe. Inyuma y'urundi rugendo rw'ibiteramo mu 1975, yafashe amajwi ikibiriraho indirimbo No Woman No Cry kuri The Lyceum, i Londres, ica isohoka yonyene (single) ibera Bob Marley indirimbo yiwe mbere yagiye ku rutonde rw'izikundwa cane mu Bwongereza. Uwo muririmvyi yaciye aja mu murongo w'abaririmvyi bakomeye kw'isi aca aba izina rizwi mu aho uciye hose. Marley yari azwi ku kwemera kwiwe gushingiye kuri  Rastafarism, hamwe n'umugore wiwe, Rita, idini rikaba ryaragaragara mu ndirimbo ziwe. Uwo muririmvyi yarakunda kandi cane umupira w'amaguru, vyari bizwi ko acishamwo akaja gukina iyo afashe akaruhuko mu gihe co gutegura indirimbo (muri studio) canke imbere yo kuremesha igiteramo. Mu kiganiro mu 1980 yavuze ati: "Nkunda umuziki imbere yo gukunda umupira." "Gukina umupira w'amaguru no kuririmba n'ibintu bibangamye kuko umupira urimwo kubabazanya. Ndirimba amahoro, urukundo n'ibindi nk'ivyo, urabona uriko urakina ntawuzi igishobora gushika, "Umuntu aguteze akakubabaza umenga ibaye intambara." Igiteramo c'ikibiriraho ca nyuma ca Bob Marley mu Bwongereza cabaye itariki 13 ukwezi kw'indwi mu 1980 muri New Bingley Hall, Stafford. Marley yaciye apfa mu mwaka ukurikira ahitanywe n'indwara ya melanone acral-lentigineux yari yatowe mu 1977. Yashinguwe aho yavukiye muri Jamaica mu kigwati ca Nine Mile. Amafoto yose n'aya nyeneyo.

headline: Burundi: Girumuco Téline atambukira inzu y'imideli Yves St Laurent ati: 'Nakunze umudeli kubera dawe'
text: Umurundikazi Girumuco Téline Féerie afitaniye amasezerano y'umudeli n'inzu rurangiranwa yo mu Bufaransa Yves Saint Laurent, avuga ko yabikunda kuva akiri umwana. Uwo mwigeme avuga ko yatanguye umwuga w'umudeli mu 2016 mu nzu [agence] yitwa Winners' fashion. Agira ati:" Nabikunze nkiri umwana. Ngira aho nabirabira cane hari ku muvyeyi wanje, dawe; yakora mu bintu vy'impuzu." Indoto za Téline ngo zari izo kwambika abantu, agakora impuzu mu Burundi abantu ntibabe bakizikura mu mahanga. Uwo mwigeme yiga mu gisata co gutumatumanako amakuru ngo afise umugambi wo kuva muri ico gisata aje gutangura kwiga gushona imideli. Agitangura ivyerekeye imideli mu Burundi ngo abantu ntibabibona neza. Agira ati:" Abantu babona umenga ndiko ndata akaranga. Abavyeyi banje naragize Imana barantahura bakaza baranshigikira, ariko nk'abandi babibona mu mibano, ntibabibona neza, ariko ubu bariko barabitahura kubera babona urwego maze gushikako." Abandanya avuga ko akiri mu Burundi yagize ivyigwa nkarisha bwenge vyo gushona impuzu, abantu bakabifata nabi, kuko ntibatahura ingene yari azi ubwenge mw'ishure ariko akaja mu vyo gushona impuzu. Yaragira kandi n'ibindi vyigwa bijanye no gushona ku buhinga bwa internet, abamwigisha bakaba bari mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. Téline afise uburebure bwa metero 1.76, akaba apima ibiro 48. Atera akamo urwaruka na cane cane abigeme gukora cane kuko kenshi mu Burundi imyuga itamenyerewe badakunze kuyishigikira, bigasaba kugira inguvu nyinshi. Nta Mwuga Udakiza ni ikiganiro c'uruhererekane (Series) kizajya gihita kuri radio buri wa gatatu, no ku rubuga rwa BBC Gahuzamiryango. BBC Gahuzamiryango ihaye ikaze ibitekerezo vyanyu kuri iki kiganiro.

headline: Charles agiye kuba Umwami bwoko ki?
text: Charles, umuntu wa mbere amaze igihe kirekire ari samuragwa muri kahise k'Ubwongereza, ubu ni umwami. Imyaka 70 amaze yiga nka samuragwa, yamutumye aba umwami wa mbere yimitswe yiteguye kandi akaba ari we mwami wa mbere  yimitswe afise imyaka myinshi. Uyu mwami w'imyaka 73 yamanye na nyina wiwe mu kiringo cose yari amaze ari ku ngoma, abategetsi b'isi baza bakagenda, harimwo abashikiranganji ba mbere b'Ubwongereza 15 hamwe n'apaperezida 14 ba Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Inyuma y'ingoma y'akaroruhore, rurangiranwa, ya Elizabeth II, dushobora kuba twiteze umwami w'ubwoko ki? Ni gute kandi umuganwa azwi ko atarya umunwa ku bibazo bimubakiye azomenyera kuvuga ataho yegamiye nk'Umwami? Nk'umwami, Charles ntazoba agifise igitabo c'inzira canke uruhusha rwo kugendesha imodoka vyiwe bwite -  canke ngo ashikirize ku mugaragaro ivyiyumviro vyiwe bikomeye. Kuba umwami birasumba umuntu ku giti ciwe. Ni amabanga atandukanye, intwaro zitandukanye, nk'uko umuhinga mu bijanye n'amategeko ajanye n'ibwirizwashingiro akaba umwigisha wa kaminuza Vernon Bogdanor abisigura. Prof Bogdanor ati: "Azwi kuva kera cane ko ingendo yiwe itegerezwa guhinduka. Abanyagihugu ntibakeneye umwami aza kwiyamamaza". Umwami Charles arazi neza ko ari ngombwa kwinengesera. Mu kiganiro na BBC mu 2018, yavuze ati: "Si ndi ikijuju. Ndazi ko kuba umwami ari igikorwa gitandukanye. Kwibaza ko nzokora nk'uko nkora ni uguhuba cane". Igihugu Umwami Charles  agiye kurongora kiratandukanye cane n'ico nyina wiwe yarazwe, mbere Prof  Bogdanor abona ko umwami mushasha azoyobora Ubwongereza burangwamwo imico n'imigenzo bitandukanye, abanyagihugu bari mu madini atandukanye. Amubonamwo nk'umuntu azogerageza kuba umuhuza, azokora uko ashoboye kwose kugira ngo yiyegereze inkehwa hamwe na ba ntahonikora. Prof Bogdanor amubonamwo kandi nk'uwuzoshigikira abanyamyuga, umuziki n'imicokama - abe cane nka Shakespeare ha kwishinga gusiganwa ku mafarasi. Ariko Sir Lloyd Dorfman yakoranye n'umwami Charles mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike mw'ishirahamwe ryiwe Prince's Trust, ntabona ko azohava yirengangiza ibibazo nkoramutima nk'ivyerekeye ihindagurika ry'ikirere n'uburimyi bukingira isi (Agriculture biologique/Organic farming). Sir Lloyd ati: "Abifisemwo ubumenyi bwinshi, kandi abikora neza cane. Biragoye kwiyumvira ko yoca abiheba ubwo nyene ku musi azoba abaye Umwami". Havugwa vyinshi ku bijanye n'uko Umwami yoba yipfuza ingoma ya cami "iciriritse". Ibi bisa n'uko yokwitaho kugira ab'ingoma y'ibwami bake bazezwa amabanga, aho Charles na Camilla, umuganwa William na Catherine ari bo boba inkingi. Umusiguzi ku vyerekeye amakuru y'i bwami,  Victoria Murphy, avuga ko n'aho bimeze uko, ubutumwa nyamukuru buzoba gukomeza amahoro n'ituze. Ati: "Ntimwitege ubudasa bunini kandi buteye ubwoba. Azokwinengesera cane". Umwanditsi Robert Hardman na we ati: "Twamye twiyumvira ko Umwamikazi ari umuntu azokwama ari mu bintu biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu vyose, ariko uretse we, uyu mwami yamye aseruka gusumba umuntu uwo ari we wese mu buzima bw'igihugu, gusumba umunyaporitike uwo ari we wese". Umwanditsi akaba n'umuhinga mu vya kahise, Sir Anthony Seldon abona ko Umwami Charles aterwa intege n'uko yabonetse ko afise ukuri ku bibazo nyamukuru, nk'igihe agabisha ku bijanye n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere. Nk'akarorero, mw'ikoraniro ry'i Glasgow ryari ryarekeye ibidukikije mu 2021, Charles yarashimagijwe cane n'abategetsi bakomeye nka Perezida  Joe Biden wa Amerika aho,  nk'uko bivugwa na  Hardman, yavuze ko igihagararo afise kw'isi kizomufasha cane nk'Umwami. Ati: "Ntivyari inkuru gusa. Aba bategetsi babiri baricaranye ahantu, hanyuma biden avuga ati: 'Watumye ibi vyose biba',". Ariko ni igiki witeze kubona muri uno mwami mushasha ? Abamuzi bavuga ko muri we afise agasoni, kandi avuga make. "Umutima wumva" ni kimwe c'ukungene bamudondora. Hariho ikimenyetso nk'umuhungu yahoze yidoga ko bamutyekeza kandi bamukumira kw'ishure. Igihe kimwe yanditse ikete rija muhira ari kw'ishure avuga ingene atuntuzwa mu buraro bw'ishire, avuga ati: "Bama bantera ikandambiri ijoro ryose canke bakankubita n'imisego canke bakanterera hanze, bakankubita cane uko bashoboye kwose". Umugore wiwe Camilla, amuvuga nk'umuntu "atihangana. Ashaka ko ibintu vyose birara bikozwe. Uko niko akora ibintu". Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure kw'isabukuru igira 70 ya Charles, yavuze ko hejuru y'ubwitonzi abantu bamubonamwo, arimwo akantu ko gukina. Camilla ati: "Bamubona nk'umuntu atafyinata, kandi nivyo. Ariko nagomba kwereka abantu ikintu c'ukwiyorosha kiri muri we. Arashira amavi hasi agakina n'abana, akabasomera udukuru wa Harry Potter mbere akaganira nabo". Charles arisanzura kandi akiyorosha iyo ari mu bantu, akiyegereza abantu mu kubatera udukuru dutwenza. Kumbure ibi bizohinduka nk'umwami, ariko igihe yri umuganwa wa Wales, yaritwaye nk'umugenzi wa bose, nka sekuru, kandi ataco yisigarije. Nk'umugabo ari mu myaka ya 70, nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko Umwami azohava ahinduka. Chris Pope yakoranye na  Charles ku kigo Prince's Teaching Institute, asigura uyu mwami mushasha nk'umuntu yama afise akazi kenshi, afise umwete kandi akora cane. Pope ati: "Ni umuntu yitaho cane kazoza keza k'abari imbere. Ibi uzobibonera mu bikorwa vyinshi akora". Mu bikorwa vy'ubugiraneza nk'umuganwa harimwo gukingira iragi no kubungabunga ubuhinga kama - ariko kandi agahimiriza impinduka n'iterambere". Pope ati: "Yama afise umwitwarariko ko akaranga katotakara, ariko ibi ntibisigura ko avuga ko dukwiye gusubira ku vya kera". Inyifato y'uyu Mwami mushasha  isa n'iyishaka gufatira ibi vyose hamwe , ikintu gishobora kuboneka nko kutagira aho ahagaze, gushaka ihinduka mu gihe ashaka kubungabunga akaranga. Rimwe na rimwe, asa n'umuntu yahoze ari umurimyi wo mu kinjana ca 18. Ikindi gihe, akumvikana nk'umuntu ashavuriye ihinduka, ababajwe n'ukungene abantu bamwe bamwe batitaweho kandi bibagiwe. Hari vyinshi azokora yarazwe na nyina wiwe mu gukunda ibikorwa, ariko kandi Umwami Charles  yaratoranye ukwemera n'uburwaneza vya nyina wiwe. Hitan Mehta yarakoranye nawe kuva igihe amufasha gushinga ishirahamwe British Asian Trust  mu 2007. Mehta avuga ati: "Umutima wiwe wuzuye ubugiraneza. Nibaza ko abantu batazi urugero rw'ukungene yitaho abantu. Igihe cose yama ariko aravuga ku vyerekeye isi ashaka gusigira abuzukuru  biwe. Ni ikibazo kimuhagaritse umutima". Ibi bishobora kubonekera ku kungene ahamagarira abantu kugira ico bakoze. Mehta ati:  "Hategerezwa kuba hari nk'isaha zitatu umusi umwe, hari ku wa gatanu mw'ijoro, aho naza numva terefone yiwe akambwira ati: 'Mpejeje kwumva imyuzurira yateye muri Pakistan. None turiko dukora iki'?  Ibi ntibisigura ko ata kintu yari afise akora. Ariko yumvise ikibazo kandi ariko aragikorerako. Ni ukuri ni umuntu yitaho abandi". Avuga kuri se wiwe, umuganwa Harry avuga ati: "Uyu ni umugabo ashobora gufungura ijoro ryitereye, yaheza agaca asubira ku meza kwandika, akavamwo asinzirira kw'ikaye". Charles Philip Arthur George yavukiye ku kirimba ca  Buckingham ku wa 14 z'ukwa 11 mu 1948. Igihe BBC imenyesha ivuka ryiwe, inkuru ntiyari iy'uko Umwamikazi yavyaye umwana w'umuhungu, ahubwo yari iy'uko nyina wiwe "yibarutse umuganwa". Haciye imyaka ine, yaciye aba samuragwa. Mu kiganiro co mu 2005, Charles yavuze ati: "Nisanze navutse mfise iki kibanza. Rero ni ngombwa ko ndagikamisha. Kandi ngakora ico nshoboye cose kugira mfashe". Arongoye amashirahamwe arenga 400, hanyuma mu 1976 yatanguje ishirahamwe ryiwe bwite, Prince's Trust, akoresheje amafaranga yatekerewe avuye mu gisirikare kirwanira mu mazi (Royal Navy). Rimaze gufasha ba ntahonikora bakiri bato bababa 900.000 bava mu bice bimwe bimwe bikenye cane mu gihugu, rikaba kandi ryamutumye ashobora kubona ingorane zitari nke zijanye n'imibereho y'abantu. Imigambi yari afitiye ishirahamwe Prince's Trust kugira rishobore gushikira ico yise "abagoye gushikirwa" ntiyaguye neza abategetsi. Mu 2018, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati ntibwabona ko ari iciyumviro ciza. Vyaragoranye gutangura". Igikorwa ciwe catumye yagirizwa gutoba no kwivanga muri poritike, ibi birego bikaba vyari bishingiye cane cane  ku ciswe "black spider memos" (twogereranya mu kirundi nka Inzandiko zirabura z'igitangurirwa ). Iri zina barifatiye ku nyadiko ya Charles y'igitangurigwa, aya akaba yari amakete Charles yandikira abashikiranganji bari muri reta kuva mu 2004 no kubandanya. Aya makete yinuba inzira reta yakoresha mu guhangana n'ibibazo nk'uburimi, gutunganya ibisagara, inyubako,  indero n'ibindi. Uwahoze ari umushikiranganji yarungikiwe aya makete ya Charles avuga ko atumva ko atewe igitsure cinshi, ariko abona ko umwami mushasha ari umuntu afise ivyiyumviro ntabanduka. Abona ko aje afise ivyiyumviro vyiwe ashaka kubandanya, aho kwemera kwakira ivyiyumviro bidasa n'ivyiwe. Ati: "Si numva ko mbangamiwe. Yarashikiriza ivyiyumviro vyiwe hanyuma ukaronka amakete. Si wa muntu yategeka canke yakara, ni umuntu yubaha". Ku vyo yagirizwa ko yariko aratoba, mu kiganiro yatanze mu 2006,  Charles yavuze ati: "Nimba uko ari ko kwivanga mu bintu, aho rero ndavyishimiye". Ariko aremeza ko yari mu bintu atabona "amaherezo yavyo". Ati: "Iyo ata kintu na kimwe ukoze, ata kintu na kimwe, bazokwidogera. Uhagurutse ukagerageza kugira ico ukoze kugira ngo ufashe, naho nyene barakwidogera". Mu kiganiro cakurikiye, yavuze ko yagerageje kwirinda imigambwe, ariko ko hageze aho bimubera ngombwa ko aterera ijwi hejuru ku vyerekeye "ingene abantu bari babayeho". None abanyagihugu bazoshigikira umwami Charles ku rugero rungana gute? Charles  avuga ati: "Ikintu nk'ingoma ya cami ntigishobora kumara kabiri mu gihe utokwishimikiza ivyiyumviro vy'abanyagihugu. Erega abanyagihugu batagishatse, ntaco bazobona". Nk'uko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'ikigo YouGov muri Kigarama (12) 2021 kivyerekana, abantu baramukunze cane, aho hafi bibiri vya bitagu vy'abanyagihugu bamubonamwo umuco mwiza. Ariko amatora ngereranyo abandanya amwerekana ko adakunzwe nk'uko nyina wiwe, Umwamikazi Elizabeth II, canke umuhungu wiwe umuganwa William, bakunzwe, rero haracari benshi ategerezwa kwiyegereza. Cane cane, abakiri bato ntibamwiyumvamwo cane. Victoria Murphy avuga ko ibi bishobora kuba vyerekana ingaruka y'amashusho mabi ya Charles mu mareresi no mu biganiro vy'imboneshakure ku vyerekeye umubano wiwe n'umugore wiwe wa mbere , Diana, Umuganwakazi wa Wales, yapfiriye mw'isanganya ry'imodoka mu kwa munani 1997. Aya mashusho afise kuba ari uruvangatirane rw'ay'ukuri hamwe n'amakorano, ariko afise ingaruka zikomeye. Umupfasoni Murphy ati: "Ikintu gitangaje kuva mu myaka mike iheze ni ukungene Diana abandanya agaruka mu biyago vyerekeye umuryango w'i bwami". Mu gihe Charles yariko atera yegereza ingoma, habaye ukugerageza guhindura ivyiyumviro biri mu mitwe y'abantu, nk'uko umwigisha wa kaminuza, Pauline Maclaran, abivuga. Kuva batanguye kumucisha mu dukino dutandukanye nk'akitwa Spitting Image, bukebuke yagiye yerekanwa nk'umunyacubahiro, "umushingantahe" afise ibintu ngirakamaro avuga ku vyerekeye ibidukikije, nk'uko Prof Maclaran abivuga. Kumbure ivyo abanyagihugu bipfuza na vyo nyene si ukuvuga ko vyera. Hanyuma we nk'umukuru w'umuryango w'i bwami, azotegerezwa guhangana n'ikibazo giteye inambu isi ku bivugwa ku Muganwa Harry, na Meghan, umgore wiwe, hamwe n'iimgenderanire yabo n'umuryango w'i bwami. Umwami Charles azohangana n'ibindi bibazo vyo mu muryango, nk'ivyerekeye ikibazo c'uko Umuganwa Andrew ashobora guhabwa amabanga canke ntayahabwe, ni inyuma y'umwumvikano wabaye inyuma y'ibirego vyo gufata ku nguvu vyatanzwe na Virginia Giuffre. Hanze y'Ubwongereza, ikibazo nyamukuru kizoba ugutunganya gushasha imigenderanire igezweho n'ishirahamwe Commonwealth. Nk'umukuru mushasha waryo,  ni gute mu ngendo ziwe mu bihugu vya Commonwealth azoshobora guhangana n'ibibazo vy'umurage ugoye w'ubukoloni canke ibibazo nk'ubucakara? Umwami Charles abaye umukuru w'ibihugu 14 hamwe kandi n'Ubwongereza. Bimwe muri ibi bifise kurondera ubwigenge ariko biri muri Commonwealth, mbere umwami Charles aramaze gusigura neza ko yiteguriye ibiganiro nk'abantu bakuze ku bijanye n'ivyohinduka. Hari ingingo zimaze gufatwa zoroheje inzira y'ingoma yiwe nshasha. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, yaranezerewe cane igihe nyina wiwe yafata ijambo akavuga ko Camilla akwiye kwitwa Umutambukanyi w'umwami, hakwitwa umuganwakazi. Camilla azoba kirumara cane mu gihe Charles atanguye amwe mu mabanga akomeye cane kw'isi, ku myaka y'aho hafi abantu bose baba bakukurutse. Iki ni igihe camye kimurindiriye ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Ku Mwami Charles, ik ini igihe ciwe.

headline: Umuntu ashaje gusumba abandi i Buraya yarokotse Covid imbere y'isabukuru y'imyaka 117
text: Umubikira w'umufaransa, umunyabulaya ashaje gusumba abandi bose kuri uwo mugabane, yarokotse Covid-19, mu gihe hasigaye imisi mike ngo ahimbaze isabukuru y'imyaka 117 amaze avutse. Lucile Randon, yiswe izina ry'ikibikira rya Mama Andre mu 1944, yamenyekanye ko yanduye coronavirus ku wa 16 z'ukwa mbere ariko nta bimenyetso na bimwe yagaragaje. Yabwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ko ata n'uko yari azi ko yayanduye. Yaciye yitaramura mu nzu y'abakukuruke iri ahitwa Toulon mu bumanuko bw'Ubufaransa, ariko ubu aboneka ko yakize neza. Mama Andre, ubu akaba atabona kandi agendera kw'igare y'abamugaye, ariko yitegurira guhimbaza ivuka ryiwe ejo ku wa kane - n'aho azohimbaza uwo musi ari kumwe n'abantu bake cane, gusumba uko vyahora. Umuvugizi w'ikigo c'abakukuruke ca Sainte Catherine Labouré, David Tavella, avuga ati: "Yaragiriwe amahirwe menshi". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Var Matin ati: "Ntiyambajije ibijanye n'amagara yiwe, ahubwo yambajije ibijanye n'imibereho yiwe. Nk'akarorero, yaripfuje kumenya nimba amasaha yo gufungura no kuryama bigiye guhinduka". "Ntiyigeze yerekana ko atinya iyi ndwara. Ahubwo yari afitiye impungenge abandi basanzwe babana muri ico kigo". Mamar Andre yavutse ku wa 11 z'ukwa kabiri mu 1904. Mu gihe azwi ko ari we muntu wa mbere ashaje ku mugabane wa Buraya, azwi kandi nk'umuntu agira kabiri ashaje kw'isi yose, nk'uko biri ku rutonde rw'ikigo Gerontology Research Group's (GRG) gisanzwe gikora ubushakashatsi bwo kurondera abantu bashaje kw'isi. Abajijwe n'ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa BFM nimba yari afise ubwoba bwo kuba yaranduye Covid, Mama Andre yishuye ati: "Oya, nta bwoba nari mfise, kubera ntatinya gupfa". "Ndanezerewe no kuba kumwe na mwe, ariko nipfuza ko mba ndi ahandi hantu - kumwe na mukuru wanje, sokuru wanje na nyokuru wanje".

headline: Uganda: Udukingirizo imiliyoni 4 tudakwije ibisabwa bagomba ko tuvanwa mu bantu
text: Abategetsi ba Uganda bategetse ko udukingirizo duherutse gutangwa incuro zibiri n'ishirahamwe Marie Stopes Uganda rijejwe irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza dukurwa mu bantu. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe na muganga Carole Sekimpi, arongoye Marie Stopes, avuga ati: "Turazi ko Life Guard ikwije ibisabwa n'amategeko. Ariko, izatanzwe ku ncuro zibiri ziheruka ntizikwije ivyo dusaba". Arashimangira ariko y'uko iyo ngingo yerekeye iziherutse gutangwa kuri izi ncuro zibiri za nyuma. Ikinyamakuru Daily Monitor kivuga ko utwo dukingirizo tungana n'imiliyoni zine. Ikigo kijejwe imiti muri Uganda (NDA) casohoye urwandiko mu kwezi guheze kivuga ko ibipimo vyerekana "udutoboro n'ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko utwo dukingirizo dushobora guturika". Muri urwo rwandiko, Victoria Nambasa, ajejwe kugenzura ko imiti ikwije ibisabwa n'amategeko muri ico kigo yanditse ati: "Tubahaye indwi zibiri kugira ngo mutwereke ingene muzoba mwazikuye mu bantu n'abakiriya bazoba bazisubije". Ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara y'abantu muri Uganda bivuga ko udukingirizo hafi imiliyoni 800 ari two dukenewe ngo birinde imbanyi batipfuza, SIDA n'indwara ziciye mu mibonano mpuzabitsina.

headline: Afghanistan: Abana bashonje bahabwa imiti yo gutora itiro hakanagurishwa ingingo z'umubiri
text: Na Yogita Limaye BBC News, Herat A﻿banya-Afghanistan basigaye baha imiti abana babo kugira babasinzirize - abandi bagurisha abakobwa babo n'ingingo z'umubiri kugira babe baramaze kabiri. Ku gihe  c'imbeho (hiver/winter) kigira kabiri kuva aba-Taliban bagarutse ku butegetsi hanyuma imfashanyo ziva hanze zigahagarikwa,  abaharurwa muri za miriyoni bugarijwe n'inzara. A﻿bdul Wahab avuga ati: "Abana bacu baguma barira, kandi ntibasinzira. Nta vyo kurya dufise." "﻿Duca tuja kuri farumasi, tukazana ibini tugaha abana bacu kugira bashobore gutora itiro." U﻿wo mugabo aba mu nkengera za Herat, igisagara kiza ubugira gatatu mu bunini muri ico gihugu, mu kigwati  c'utuzu duto duto tw'ivyondo cagiye kiraguka kuva mu myaka iheze, kikuzura abantu bomowe n'intambara n'ibindi biza vyizana. A﻿bdul ari mu mugwi w'abantu hafi 10 baje begera aho turi. Twarababajije, tuti ni bangahe baha imiti abana babo kugira babasinzirize?  Nabo bishura bati: "Benshi, twese". Ghulam Hazrat  yaciye akora mu mufuko wiwe asokorora agapfungo k'ibinini.  Vyari ibinini vya  alprazolam - ibinini ku bisanzwe bihabwa abantu baba bafise ingorane z'umwitwarariko mwinshi. Ghulam afise abana batandatu, umuto muri bo afise umwaka umwe. Ati: "Nawe nyene ndamuha". Abandi batweretse ibinini vya escitalopram na sertraline bavuze ko baha abana babo. Ivyo navyo ku bisanzwe vyandikirwa abayinze n'abafise umwitwarariko mwinshi. A﻿baganga bavuga ko iyo ihawe abana bakiri bato kandi bataronka ivyo kurya bihagije, imiti bene iyo yonona igitigu (umwijima mu kinyarwanda), igatera 'izindi ngorane nyinshi nko kwama ufise uburuhe, n'ihungabana ryo gusinzira n'inyifato. K﻿uri farumasi imwe, twasanze ushobora kugura ibinini bitanu vy'iyo miti ikoreshwa ku ma Afghani (amafaranga yo muri Afgnistan) 10, (nka 200 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi), ayagura ikimanyu c'umukate. Myinshi mu miryango twahuye yasangira ibimanyu bikeye vy'imikate buri munsi. Umugore umwe yatubwiye ko bari bariye umukate wumye mu gitondo, mw'ijoro naho bakuwudumba mu mazi kugira worohe. O﻿NU ivuga ko ubu "akaga" kariko karaba muri Afghanistan. Abagabo benshi mu karere kari ku nkengera ya Herat bakora ibikonkwano vyo ku munsi mu mirima. Bamaze imyaka babayeho ubuzima bugoye. Hagati aho, igihe aba-Taliban bafata ubutegetsi mu kwezi kw'umunani, ariko reta yabo ntiyemerwe n'amakungu, amafaranga yaja muri Afghanistan avuye hanze yaciye ahagarikwa, bituma ubutunzi butembagara, gutyo bituma abagabo benshi kenshi bakabura  ico bakora. K﻿u munsi bagize igihamana bakaronka akazi, baca nk'ama Afghani 100 (ni ibihumbi bibiri birenga gato mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). A﻿ho twagiye hose twasanze abantu bafata ingingo zikomeye cane kugira imiryango yabo ntiyicwe n'inzara. Ammar (siryo zina ryiwe ry'ukuri) yavuze ko yabazwe kugira bamukuremwo ifyigo haraheze amezi atatu aca aratwereka n'inkovu ndende y'aho babaze - n'ahaciye inyuzi hagitukura - kuva mu kaziba k'inda utera uja mu mugongo. A﻿ri mu myaka ya 20, yategerezwa kuba  ari mu myaka iryoshe y'ubuzima bwiwe. Twanyegeje umwidondoro wiwe kugira tumukingire. Y﻿avuze ati: "Nta kundi nari kugira. Numvise ko ushobora kugurisha ifyigo ku bitaro vya hano. Nca ndajayo hanyuma ndababwira ko nshaka [kurigurisha]. Haheze amayinga make, naciye nvumva bampamagaye bansaba kuja ku bitaro." "﻿Barakoze ibipimo bikeya, hanyuma bantera umuti watumye ntasubira kumenya ubwenge. Naragize ubwoba ariko nta kundi nari kugira." Ammar bamuhaye ama Afghani hafi 270.000 (arenga miriyoni 6,2 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) kuri iryo fyigo, amenshi akaba yagiye mu kuriha amafaranga yari yaguranye kugira asumire ivyo kurya umuryango wiwe. "﻿Iyo turiye muri iri joro, irikurikira ntiturya. Maze kugurisha ifyigo ryanje, numva umenga nsigaye ndi umuntu adakwiye. Numva nihebuye. Hamwe ubuzima bwobandanya gutya, numva nzohava mpfa," niko avuga. K﻿ugurisha ingingo z'umubiri si ikintu gishasha muri Afghanistan. Vyahora bikorwa n'imbere y'uko aba-Taliban bafata ubutegetsi. Ariko n'iyo abantu bafashe ingingo nk'iyo ibabaza cane, n'ubundi basanga badashobora kuronka uburyo bwo kubaho. M﻿u nzu ata na kimwe kirimwo, yuzuye imbeho, twahasanze umugore avuga ko hari haheze amezi indwi agurishije ifyigo ryiwe. Bakoresheje ayo mafaranga mu kuriha ideni - amafaranga bari baguranye ngo bagure ubusho bw'intama. Ariko izo ntama zaciye zipfa zihitanywe n'imyuzure mu myaka iheze, gutyo baca baratakaza aho bahora bakura uburaro n'uburamuko. A﻿ma-Afghani 240.000 (miriyoni hafi 5,5 mu marundi) yaronse kuri iryo fyigo ntakwiye. "﻿Ubu nta kundi turi bugire atari ukugurisha umwana wacu w'umukobwa w'imyaka ibiri. Abatuguranye amafaranga batwamizako induru, batubwiye ngo duhe umukobwa wanyu niba mudashoboye kutwishura," niko avuga. "﻿Ndamaramazwa cane n'aho tugeze. Rimwe na rimwe numva ari vyiza gupfa kuruta kubaho gutya," ivyo navyo bivugwa n'umugabo wiwe. Kenshi cane, twarumvise inkuru z'abagurisha abakobwa babo. Nizamuddin ati: "Naragurishije umukobwa wanje w'imyaka itanu ku ma Afghani 100.000." A﻿yo ntashika ayo ifyigo rigurwa, nk'uko twabibonye. U﻿bu agateka k'abantu b'aha mu kubaho karatabagajwe n'inzara. A﻿bdul Ghafar, umwe mu ndongozi z'aho ati: "Turumva ko biteye kubiri n'amategeko ya Islam kandi ko dushira ubuzima bw'abana bacu mu kaga, ariko nta yindi nzira ihari."  M﻿u rugo rumwe twahasanze Nazia, akana k'agakobwa k'imyaka ine kariko karakina kagira utugugu na Shamshullah, musazawe w'amezi 18. S﻿e wiwe, Hazratullah, ati: "Nta mafaranga dufise yo kugura ivyo kurya, none aho nari ku musigiti natangaje ko nshaka kugurisha umukobwa wanje." N﻿azia yaragurishijwe ngo arongorwe n'umuhungu wo mu muryango wo mu ntara yo mu bumanuko ya Kandahar. Ku mwaka 14 azoca arungikwa. Gushika ubu Hazratullah amaze kwakira kabiri amafaranga yo kumugura. Hazratullah avuga ko menshi muri ayo mafaranga yakoreshejwe mu kugura ivyo kurya, ayandi imiti y'umuhungu wiwe muto. A﻿ti: "Murabe, arwaye indwara zo kurya nabi" aho akaba yaciye aduza ishati yiwe ngo atwereke ingene akada kiwe gafoye. Urugero runini rw'abana batarya ibidakwiye ni ikimenyetso c'ingaruka inzara iriko iragira ku bana bafise munsi y'imyaka itanu muri Afganistan. Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) ivuga ko igitigiri c'abana bazanwa ku mavuriro yayo yitaho abana barwaye kubera kurya nabi mu gihugu ciyongeye gushika ku 47% uyu mwaka ugereranije no mu mwaka uheze. I﻿kigo ca MSF gitanga ingaburo muri Herat nico conyene gifise ivya nkenerwa bikwiye, ariko ntigifasha abo muri ico gisagara gusa, cakira kandi abo mu ntara bihana urubibe za Ghor na Badghis aho abafise izo ngorane biyongeye gushika ku 55% mu mwaka uheze. K﻿uva mu mwaka uheze, barongereje ibitanda kugira bashobore kwakira abana bakeneye kuvurwa. Ariko n'ubu ico kigo cama kirengewe. Uko iminsi ihera, niko abana bazanwa usanga bakeneye kuvurwa indwara zirenga imwe. O﻿mid, ku mezi 4, apima ibiro 4 gusa. Abaganga batubwiye ko umwana asanzwe kuri ayo mezi aba apima nibura ibiro 6,6. Nyina, Amana vyabaye ngombwa ko agurana amafaranga kugira afate urugendo rwo gushika ku bitaro aho aboneye ko atanguye kudahwa cane.  T﻿wabajije Hameedullah Motawakil, umuvugizi wa reta y'intara ya Herat ico bakora kugira bahangane n'ikibazo c'inzara. A﻿ti: "Ibi bintu vyatumwe n'ibihano mpuzamakungu vyafatiwe Afghanistan hamwe no gufatira amatungo ya Afghanistan. Reta yacu iriko iragerageza guharura abakeneye gufashwa ingene bangana. Benshi barabesha ingene bamerewe kuko bibaza ko baca bafashwa." Ni insiguro yagumye ahagazeko n'ubwo twamubwiye ko twari twabonye ibimenyetso vyeruye vy'ingene ibintu bimeze nabi cane. Y﻿avuze kandi ko aba-Taliban bariko baragerageza kugwiza ubuzi. "﻿Turiko turagerageza kwugurura ibirombe vy'ubutare bwa fer hamwe n'umugambi wo kwubaka umuringoti utwara gaz." N﻿tibisa n'uko ari ibintu bizoba ubu vuba. A﻿bantu batubwiye ko bumva barahebwe na reta y'aba-Taliban hamwe n'amakungu. I﻿nzara ni rwica-ruhoze, ingaruka zayo ntizama zica zigaragara buno nyene. K﻿ure y'amaso y'amakungu, urugero rw'akaga kariko karaba muri Afghanistan rushobora kutamenyekana, kuko ata n'umwe ariko araharura.

headline: Covid-19: indwi barapfuye inyuma yo guterwa AstraZeneca muru UK, biteye amakenga
text: Abantu indwi nibo bamaze gupfa mu Bwongereza kubera ivura ry'amaraso ryabaye inyuma y'aho baterewe urucanco rwa AstraZeneca, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo kijejwe imiti muri ico gihugu. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho habonekeye abantu bakeya bagize ikibazo c'amaraso avura bamaze guterwa uwo rucanco. Gushika ku wa 24 z'ukwa gatatu, mu bantu bangana na miriyoni 18 bari bamaze guhabwa uru rucanco, 30 muri bo nibo bagize iki kibazo c'ivura ry'amaraso. Hagati aho, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO hamwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya rijejwe imiti, yompi avuga ko inyungu z'uru rucanco zisumba kure ingaruka rushobora kugira. Umuvugizi wa AstraZeneca avuga ati: "Amagara y'umurwayi nico kintu tubandanya dushira imbere". Abahinga hamwe n'abajejwe kwihweza imiti kw'isi bariko barihweza nimba uru rucanco ari rwo koko rutera iri vura ry'amaraso, urugero bishobora kuba, n'inkurikizi ku mugambi wo gucandaga. Aya makenga niyo yatumye ibihugu bimwe bimwe harimwo Ubudagi, Ubufaransa, Ubuholande hamwe na Canada, bifata ingingo y'uko uru rucanco ruhabwa abatama n'abatamakazi gusa. Ibiharuro vyashizwe ahabona n'ikigo kijejwe kwihweza imiti mu Bwongereza MHRA vyerekana ko abantu 22 aribo bagize ibibazo vy'ivura ry'amaraso mu bwonko, kizwi nka thrombose du sinus veineux cérébral (canke cerebral venous sinus thrombosis,CVST). Hari abandi umunani nabo nyene basanze bafise ibimenyetso bishobora gutuma amaraso yabo avura. Mu butumwa muravyo (e-mail) ikigo MHRA carungikiye BBC, camenyesheje ko "abantu indwi bapfuye". Iyi ngorane kandi iramaze kwibonekeza no mu Budagi, aho abantu 31 ari bo bagize ikibazo c'amaraso kuvura, icenda bakaba barapfuye, ku bantu imiriyoni 2.7 bahawe urucanco rwa AstraZeneca, abenshi muri bo bakaba ari abagore bakiri bato. Iki nico catumye ku musi wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi reta ifata ingingo yo kubangira kurutera abakiri bato. Gushika ubu, ntibiratomoreka. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, ikigo kijejwe imiti ku mugabane wa Buraya (EMA) cavuze ko ata kivyemeza ariko ko bishoboka. Iki kigo kiriko kirihweza nimba iri vura ry'amaraso ari inkurikizi ry'uru rucanco canke nimba ari ikintu cari gisanzwe cobaye bigaca bihurirana. Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kuko iyaba vyari ibintu bishobora gushikira nk'umwe mu bihumbi cumi, aha vyaca bigaragara neza koko ko ari inkurikizi. Hagati aho, umuhinga mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu, Prof. Linda Bauld wo kw'ishure kaminuza rya Edinburgh, yabwiyte BBC  ko iki kibazo ari "ikintu kidahuse kiribonekeza" agashimangira ko gushika ubu ata "cemeza nimba koko ari ingaruka z'uru rucanco". Ahanura abantu kubandanya bitabira incaco, akongerako ati: "Covid yonyene ubwayo irashobora gutuma amaraso avura, kandi bishoboka ko ibi ari bimwe mu biriko bituma tubona ibi bintu". Muri kino gihe, isi yose ibandanya isuzuma neza aya makuru, ariko insobanuro nyayo ishobora gufata igihe kitari gito.

headline: Umuti wa mbere wa SIDA uterwa mu rushinge ukamara igihe kirekire wemejwe
text: Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barwaye umugera wa SIDA bagiye guhabwa umuti uterwa mu rushinge ukamara igihe kirekire, maze bagahagarika vya binini bama bafata buri musi. Abagiraneza bishimiye cane uyu muti mushasha wemejwe n'ikigo kijejwe ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza NHS. Uyu muti utuma umugera ugabanya inguvu, ukaba ukora co kimwe na vya binini vyo gupfupfahaza bisanzwe bifatwa buri musi. Vyitezwe ko mu Bwongereza abantu bababa 13.000 bashobora guca bahindukirira uyu muti. Imiti Cabotegravir (uzwi kandi kw'izina rya Vocabria ukaba wahinguwe n'ikigo ViiV Healthcare) hamwe na rilpivirine (uwu nawo ukaba uzwi kandi nka Rekambys wahinguwe na Janssen) ni imiti iterwa incuro zibiri rumwe rumwe ukwarwo rimwe mu mezi abiri. Hagati aho, uwu muti ugirira akamaro gusa barya bantu bageze ku rugero rw'aho umugera utakiboneka mu maraso inyuma y'igihe bariko barafata vya binini. Abahinga bavuga ko uwu muti ushobora kugirira akamaro abantu benshi. Umwigisha wa kaminuza Chloe Orkin, akaba ari umuhinga mu bijanye n'umugera wa SIDA kuri kaminuza ya Queen Mary i Londres/London, avuga ko uwu muti ushobora kugabaniriza abarwayi umuzigo wo kwama bafata vya binini buri musi, kuko wowo bazowuterwa incuro zitandatu gusa mu mwaka. Muganga Sanjay Bhagani, arongoye ishirahamwe European Aids Clinical Society, avuga ati: "Iki ni ikintu gikomeye cane". "Kunenwa ni ikibazo gikomeye cane ku banduye umugera wa SIDA, kandi abatari bake ntiboroherwa no gufata ibinini imisi yose. Ibi rero bizotuma abenshi baronswa uwu muti uterwa mu rushinge". Alex Sparrowhawk w'i Manchester, asanzwe akora mw'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya SIDA rizwi nka Terrence Higgins Trust. Haciye imyaka 12 yanduye umugera wa SIDA, kuva ico gihe akaba ari ku binini vya  ART imisi yose. Avuga ko ari ikintu kiryoheye ugutwi kwumva ko hari uwundi muti ushobora kugabanya uwu muzigo. "Iyi nkuru ni ikintu abantu benshi bari bamaze igihe kirekire barindiranye igishika. "Iciyumviro co guterwa umuti incuro zitandatu gusa mu mwaka hagufata imiti ya misi yose ni ikintu gishimishije cane. Kwibuka ko wama ufata imiti ya SIDA  buri musi vyama bwikwibutsa ko urwaye SIDA  kandi ntibishobora kukuvamwo. "Hari abantu bashobora kuba babana n'abandi batazi ko banduye canke batanduye umugera, canke usanga bakora mu buzi bubatuma bazunguruka irya n;ino kw'isi, ibi bigashobora kuba inzitizi ku kwama umuntu afata imiti imisi yose". Kubw'iwe, abakwiye gushirwa imbere mu kuronswa uwu muti ni abo bose bawukeneye cane gusumba abandi, nk'akarorero abasanzwe bahura n'ikibazo co kunenwa.

headline: DR Congo: Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano ifise impungenge kuri M23
text: Abagize Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kw’isi basubiriye gushikiriza impungenge bafise kw’ivyuka ry’umuhari w’inyeshamba wa M23 n’iyindi mirwi y’inyeshamba irangwa mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Mw’itangazo iyo Nama yaraye isohoye, yasubiye kwiyamiriza yivuye inyuma imirwi y’inyeshamba ikiyogoza muri ico gihugu, yaba iyo hagati mu gihugu canke iyiva hanze. Amakuru ava mu karere k’Ubuseruko bwa Congo avuga ko intambara zibica bigacika hagati y’ingabo za Congo (FARDC) n’umuhari M23 mu micungararo ya Rutshuru no mu bindi bisagara. Abagize iyo Nama basaba imirwi yose  yitwaje ibirwanisho guhagarika ubugizi bwa nabi idatevye hanyuma imihari y’inyeshamba  ya Congo nayo ikitabira, ataco irinze gusaba, umugambi wo gusubiza ibirwanisho no gusubira mu buzima busanzwe. Isaba kandi imirwi y’inyeshamba iva hanze gushira ibirwanisho hasi idatevye hanyuma igasubira mu bihugu yaje ivamwo. Basubiye kumenyesha ko bashigikiye « ubwigenge, ubumwe n’ubusugire bw’igihugu ca Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo ». Ni mu gihe intambara zibica bigacika mu turere tw’intara ya Kivu, aho amakuru avuga ko intambara zabandanije mu gatondo ko kuri uno wa gatandatu mu micungararo y’igisagara ca Rutshuru na Kiwanja mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru, nk’uko vyandikwa n’iradiyo Okapi y’aho muri Congo. Isubiramwo ababibonye bavuga ko izo ntambara zibera kw’ibarabara No 2 rihuza Rutshuru n’igisagara ca Goma ritakirengana kuva ejo ku wa gatanu kubera intambara. Abasirikare bavugwa ko babonywe bariko basubira inyuma bava mu gisagara ca Kiwanja, mu gihe abanyagihugu bafise ubwoba ko ico gisagara gishobora kuba camaze gufatwa n’umuhari M23, ibitarashobora kwemezwa gushika ubu n’abategetsi. Gushika ejo ku wa gatanu, nk’uko vyandikwa na Radio Okapi, M23 yari yamaze kwigarurira uturere hafi twose twa Busanza, Jomba, Bweza et Kisigari, hamwe n’ibigwati bimwe bimwe vy’akarere ka Rugari, kari ku birometero 30 mu buraruko bw’igisagara ca Goma. G﻿ushika ubu, ntaco abategetsi ba gisirikare barashikiriza ku kungene ibintu bimeze kuri uno wa gatandatu muri Rutshuru.

headline: Misire yo gucungera ikirere ya Syria yaguye hafi y'ikigo ca nikleyeri ca Israel
text: Igisasu ca misire gikorora indege ca Syria caturikiye mu bumanuko bwa Israel, ku birometero 30 gusa uvuye ku kigo c'ibanga ca nucléaire. Amahona yo gutabaza (sirènes) yatanguye kwumvikana imbere y'uko ico gisasu giturika mu karere ka Dimona. Nta wakomeretse kandi nta vyononekaye. Igisirikare ca Israel kivuga ko iyi misire ari imwe mu yandi atari make yatewe imbere y'aho ku ndege ya Israel. Nayo yaciye yihora mu gutera ibirindiro bitari bike muri Syria vyo gucungera ikirere. Igisirikare ca Syria kimenyesha ko izo misire za Israel zaguye hafi y'ibigo biri hafi y'umugwa mukuru Damas/Damascus. Igisirikare ca Syria kivuga kandi ko nyinshi muri izo misire zategerewe mu kirere zikamanurwa, ariko ko abasirikare bane bakomeretse, kandi ko hari "ibintu bimwe bimwe vyononekaye". Ishirahamwe rikurikiranira hagufi ibijanye n'agateka ka muntu muri Syria, Syrian Observatory for Human Rights, rifise icicaro mu Bwongereza, rivuga ko misire za Israel zatewe ku kirindiro co gucungera ikirere mu gisagara ca Dumayr kiri ku birometero 40 mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Damas. Ako karere kazwi ko ari bwo bubiko bw'ibirwanisho vy'abarwanyi bashigikiwe na Iran basanzwe barwana ku ruhande rw'igisirikare ca reta ya Syria mu ntambara iri muri ico gihugu. Mu misi iheze, hari amakuru yavuga ko ibirindiro vyo gucungera ikirere vya Israel biri hafi ya Dimona hamwe no ku kivuko ca Eilat kiri ku kiyaga gitukura (Red Sea) vyongerejwe inguvu mu kwicungera mu gihe hoba igitero c'abarwanyi bashigikiwe na Iran muri ako karere, harimwo n'abari muri Syria. Icuka kibandanya kiba kibi hagati y'ibi bihugu bisanzwe birabana ribi, Iran ikagiriza Israel ko ari yo iherutse gukora igitero ku kigo ca Natanz gihingura ubutare bwa uranium mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Israel ntiyigeze ivuga ko ari yo yakoze ico gitero. Ikigo ca nucléaire ca Dimona muri Israel  kivugwa ko cahinguye ibirwanisho vy'ubumara. Israel ntihakana canke ngo yemeze ko ifise ibirwanisho vy'ubumara.
